alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Robertson; Stewart (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 9:03AM CDT until June 17 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Montgomery County in Middle Tennessee... Stewart County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Robertson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 945 AM CDT. * At 902 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dunmor to 12 miles east of Murray, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clarksville, Dover, Guthrie, Big Rock, Adams, Cedar Hill, Cumberland City, Land Between The Lakes, Indian Mound, Palmyra and Woodlawn. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 1 and 16. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
